item.description: Buddy Dog Humane Society Celebrates 50 years of Love and Compassion! Woofstock Dog Festival! Hosted by Buddy Dog Humane Society....... Celebrating our 50th Anniversary......... Saturday, October 1st from 11:00-4:00p at the Hudson Elks Club, 99 Park St. Hudson, Ma....... Live bands, vendors, demos, food 'n drink, raffles........ The NEBBC will have a booth there, and as always, we need your support! (Confirming our booth space in the next few days.) Come represent what the NEBBC Dogs are really like!
item.name: WOOFSTOCK!
